sentences: We are looking for software developers at all levels with a passion for science, technology and robotics, Willing to research complex and innovative solutions

Helping drive growth through innovation, you will join our autonomous development program, working with the latest technologies, developing game changing autonomous vehicles and other future generation products
Come and join our 1200 employee team on our 30 acre campus in Somerset, developing software for an autonomous mobile robotic system
Using the latest cameras, Lidars, sensors, safety systems and motor drive technologies
· Degree level education or relevant knowledge through work experience
· Robotic related sensors and motion controllers
· Able to work independently or as part of a team
